data.text: Wa lusambulu luama, a Yave,
Kadi kutsuekila zizi kiaku thangu ndidi mu phasi,
Bila bilumbu biama bilembo lalakana banga muisi,
Ntimꞌama wukosikini ayi wuyumini banga biti ;
Mu diambu di kunga kuama
Ndidi banga kimfutu kidi mu dikanga ;
Ndilembo leki nkielo,
Mu lumbu kimvimba,
Bila ndilembo dia dibombi banga bidia
mu diambu di miangu miaku minneni
Bilumbu biama bidi banga kitsusula ki masika
Vayi ngeyo, a Yave, wuvuanda va kundu ki kitinu mu zithangu zioso ;
Ngeyo wela telama, wela monina Sioni kiadi.
Bila bisadi biaku binzolanga matadi mandi,
Makanda mela kinzika dizina di Yave ;
Bila Yave wela buela tunga diaka Sioni
Wela vana mvutu mu lusambulu lu batu basukama,
Bika mambu mama masonama mu diambu di tsungi yinkuiza
Yave wutala ku tsi tona ku buangu kiandi kinlongo kidi ku yilu
mu diambu di wa kunga ku batu badi mu nloko ;
buna dizina di Yave diela yolukulu mu Sioni
mu thangu batu bela kutangana va kimosi ayi bipfumu
Mu luzingu luama, wumanisa zingolo ziama ;
Buna ndituba :
Va thonono, ngeyo wutula zifondasio zi ntoto
Biela biva vayi ngeyo wela zinganga,
Vayi ngeyo wubalukanga ko,
Bana ba bisadi biaku bela zingilanga va meso maku
